item.title: We need a strong global climate alliance to save our planet: Joe Biden
item.description: Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina has said that a strong global climate alliance is urgently needed to save future generations and the planet from the adverse effects of climate change by reducing carbon emissions. She said he would like to emphasize the importance of a positive and strong international climate alliance to move towards achieving carbon balance by effectively reducing global carbon emissions before the middle of the century. This was stated by the Prime Minister in a pre-recorded speech at a virtual conference titled ‘Thimphu Ambition Summit’ aimed at accelerating the pace of globalization by 1.
